maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Humble Helper
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Modeste Soutien

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Hi!
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Salut !

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Hello Ms. \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. So great to see you here on \v[lore.title.planet].
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Bonjour Mme \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. Content de vous voir ici à \v[lore.title.planet].

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: As a humble part of our endeavor here I am trying my best to aid Seekers.
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Je ne suis qu'un modeste contributeur à notre effort commun, mais je fais de mon mieux pour aider les \v[lore.title.seeker]s.

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: But, my skills are just not on the same level as yours are.
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Mais, mes compétences ne sont pas vraiment au même niveau que les vôtres.

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Might I ask you to help me out, dear \v[lore.title.seeker]?
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Puis-je vous demander de l'aide, chère \v[lore.title.seeker] ?

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Superb!\. Come back to me when you've defeated the \v[combat.name.hedgehog]s.
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Super !\. Venez me voir lorsque vous aurez vaincu les \v[combat.name.hedgehog]s.

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Oh, okay!\. No Problem Ms. \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Please come back if you changed your mind.
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Oh, OK !\. Pas de problème Mme \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Revenez me voir si vous avez changé d'avis.

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Humble Helper
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Modeste Soutien

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Hi!
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Salut !

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Hello Ms. \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Enjoying your Journey?
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Bonjour, Mme \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. Appréciez-vous votre petite aventure ?

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Of course you do, haha!\. Oh to be young again!
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Bien sûr que oui, haha !\. Ce que c'est bon d'être jeune !

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: But... back to work.\. It looks like you still need to defeat \c[3]\v[quest.my-first-quest.subrequire.0] of these \v[combat.name.hedgehog]s\c[0].
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Mais bon, le devoir appelle.\. On dirait que vous devez encore vaincre \c[3]\v[quest.my-first-quest.subrequire.0] de ces \v[combat.name.hedgehog]s\c[0].

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Humble Helper
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Modeste Soutien

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Wow Ms. \v[lore.title.seeker], you really did it!\. Here's your rewards for it!
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Ouah, Mme \v[lore.title.seeker], vous avez vraiment réussi !\. Voici votre récompense pour cela !

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Humble Helper
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Modeste Soutien

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Hello Ms. \v[lore.title.seeker], ready for another quest?\. I even have more equipment as a reward.
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Bonjour Mme \v[lore.title.seeker], êtes-vous prête pour une autre quête ?\. J'ai même du surplus d'équipement comme récompense.

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Happy collecting and remember that different plants yield different items!
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Bonne récolte, et souvenez-vous que différentes plantes produisent des objets différents !

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Oh, okay!\. No Problem Ms. \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Please come back if you changed your mind.
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Oh, OK !\. Pas de problème Mme \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Revenez me voir si vous avez changé d'avis.

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Humble Helper
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Modeste Soutien

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Hi!
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Salut !

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Hello Ms. \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Enjoying the adventure?
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Bonjour, Mme \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. Appréciez-vous votre petite aventure ?

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Of course you do, haha!\. Oh to be young again!
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Bien sûr que oui, haha !\. Ce que c'est bon d'être jeune !

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: But... back to work.\. It looks like you still need to collect some of the \c[3]items\c[0].
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Mais bon, le devoir appelle.\. On dirait que vous devez encore récolter certains \c[3]items\c[0].

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Humble Helper
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Modeste Soutien

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Wow Ms. \v[lore.title.seeker], you really did it!\. Here's your rewards for it!
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Ouah, Mme \v[lore.title.seeker], vous avez vraiment réussi !\. Voici votre récompense pour cela !

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Humble Helper
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Modeste Soutien

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: Hello Ms. \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. I hope you enjoy your journey.
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: Bonjour, Mme \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. J'espère que vous appréciez votre aventure.

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/92/se.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/101/s.orig: How to increase \c[3]Combat Rank\c[0] to improve the drops of defeated enemies.
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/101/s.text: Comment accroitre votre \c[3]Rang de Combat\c[0] pour obtenir plus d'objets des ennemis vaincus.

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/101/s.orig: Your \c[3]combat rank\c[0] is displayed in the upper right corner during combat.
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/101/s.text: Votre \c[3]rang de combat\c[0] est affiché en haut à droite pendant un combat.

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/101/s.orig: By \c[3]defeating enemies\c[0] your rank will increase.
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/101/s.text: \c[3]Vaincre des ennemis\c[0] va augmenter votre rang.

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/101/s.orig: With a higher combat rank, enemies will \c[3]drop more items\c[0], including \c[3]special rare items\c[0].
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/101/s.text: Avec un rang de combat plus élevé, les ennemis vont \c[3]laisser plus d'objets\c[0], y compris des \c[3]objets rares\c[0].

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/101/s.orig: When you're out of combat you'll enter the \c[3]cooldown phase\c[3].
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/101/s.text: Quand vous n'êtes plus au combat, la \c[3]phase de délai\c[0] commence.

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/101/s.orig: When the blue line disappears, combat will end and you will  \c[3]lose your rank\c[0].
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/101/s.text: Quand la ligne bleue disparait, le combat est terminé et vous \c[3]perdrez votre rang\c[0].

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/101/s.orig: However, when you enter combat during cool down, you \c[3]keep your combat rank\c[3]!
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/101/s.text: En revanche, si vous continuez le combat pendant la phase de délai, vous \c[3]garderez votre rang de combat\c[0] !

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/148/s.orig: Back to where our journey started...
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/148/s.text: Autumn's Rise ! Là où notre aventure a commencé...

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/148/s.orig: By now, those enemies are kind of a joke, non?
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/148/s.text: Depuis, ces ennemis sont juste là pour rire, non ?

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/148/s.orig: I mean...\. if we didn't have the \c[3]boosters\c[0] enabled, that is.
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/148/s.text: Je veux dire...\. si on a pas activé les \c[3]boosters\c[0].
Ah ça...\. là maintenant, c'est sûr !

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/148/s.orig: I bet you got beat up plenty by those Hedgehags in the beginning.
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/148/s.text: Mais je parie que ces \v[combat.name.hedgehog]s vous ont bien pourri la vie au début.

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/148/s.orig: Lea simply \c[1]sniped them all away\c[0], you see?
Those hedgehags were easy-peasy, right, Lea?
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/148/s.text: Ces \v[combat.name.hedgehog]s étaient trop faciles, pas vrai, Lea ?

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/148/s.orig: Right. I forgot you were well prepared thanks to my amazing tutorial.
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/148/s.text: Ah oui. J'avais oublié que vous étiez bien préparé grâce à mon magnifique tutoriel.

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/148/s.orig: Non.\. Again.\. It's because \c[1]Lea just killed everything\c[0].
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/148/s.text: Non.\. Encore une fois.\. C'est parce que \c[1]Lea les a tous tués\c[0].

maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/148/s.orig:
Back then, she was the only clue I had.\.
That is why...\. I put her into the game.
maps/autumn/entrance.json/entities/148/s.text:
À l'époque, elle était le seul indice que j'avais.\.
C'était pour ça...\. que je l'ai amenée dans le jeu.
